item.title: Braised Pigs Cheeks - Nigel Slater
item.description: The accompanying potatoes produce a creamy, almost “wet” mash of a very soft and velvety texture. Serves 4. Ingredients olive oil a little pig’s cheeks 8 carrots 3 onions 2 red onion 1 celery 2 garlic 4 flour 2 tbsp thyme a generous bunch orange peel a short piece bay leaves 3 red wine 1 bottle, rich and bold sugar or fruit jelly 2 tbsp or so Method
